tool_description: Tracks and analyzes student enrollment data, providing real-time statistics and trends for course capacity planning and academic reporting.

tracking_period.description: Time period for enrollment tracking (daily, weekly, term)

error_messages: Invalid period: tracking_period must be one of [daily, weekly, term].
Course not found: One or more courses in course_filter do not exist.
Department not found: One or more departments in department_filter do not exist.
No enrollment data: No enrollment data available for the specified period and filters.
usage: Provide tracking_period to specify the analysis timeframe. Optionally use course_filter and department_filter to focus on specific courses or departments.

total_enrollments.description: Total number of student enrollments tracked

enrollment_trends.description: Enrollment trend analysis over the tracking period
